# Basic HTML Website

Create simple HTML only website with multiple pages.

![Demo](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/71359268/400038578-74c705c6-b700-419a-a5e9-c233d92d1d53.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..lEI5I3jkKFljcK3xdKq4nBXyVFOzkYzCe5GEzvKlPLA)

## Requirements for this project:

- Semantically correct HTML structure.
- Multiple pages with a navigation bar.
- SEO meta tags in the head of each page.
- Contact page should have a form with fields like name, email, message etc.

## Installation

To view Basic HTML Website, first, clone the repository. After that, you can open the index.html file in the browser of choice.

## Contributions

If you would like to contribute to task-cli, please fork the repository, create a branch for your feature or bug fix, and then submit a pull request.

## Project URL: [https://roadmap.sh/projects/single-page-cv](https://roadmap.sh/projects/basic-html-website)
